properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , EMP_NO , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME , HIRE_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE E , DEPARTMENT D , JOB J WHERE E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_ID AND E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE
SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) WHERE DEPT_TITLE = ?
SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN JOB USING(JOB_CODE) WHERE JOB_NAME = ?
SELECT EMP_NAME , SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY SALARY DESC NULLS LAST OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY;
SELECT EMP_NAME , SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY SALARY ASC NULLS LAST OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY;
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET SALARY = ? , JOB_CODE = ? , DEPT_CODE = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET ENT_DATE = ? , ENT_YN = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
